metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26116 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Versions of the package angular from 1.2.21 are vulnerable to RegularExpression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the angular.copy() utilityfunction due to the usage of an insecure regular expression. Exploitingthis vulnerability is possible by a large carefully-crafted input, whichcan result in catastrophic backtracking.

criterions.comment: angular.js package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-05-15').
